summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EchoSphere Discord-clone application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has critical UI issues with server creation modal and WebSocket connectivity.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal remains open after server creation, dialog overlay blocks all interactions
Created servers do not appear in sidebar after creation

integration_issues.issue: Server creation API succeeds but UI doesn't update properly
WebSocket connection fails on app load
integration_issues.symptoms: Console error: WebSocket is closed before connection established

passed_tests: User signup with username, email, password
Server sidebar and DM button accessibility
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical UI issues: 1) Server creation modal not closing properly and blocking interactions 2) Server list not updating after creation 3) WebSocket connection failure affecting real-time features

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (authentication and basic UI work, but server creation flow broken)
